1 var Helpers = require('../../Helpers');
  2 
  3 exports['test_Helpers'] = function (test) {
  4   test.expect(32);
  5   console.log('Unit test ' + module.filename.toString() + ' started...');
  6 
  7   var buffer = new Buffer(5);
  8   buffer.write('12345');
  9   var value1 = ['6', '7', '8'];
 10   var comb1 = Helpers._combineData(buffer, value1);
 11 
 12   test.equal(comb1.toString(), '12345678');
 13 
 14   var value2 = new Buffer('678');
 15   var comb2 = Helpers._combineData(buffer, value2);
 16 
 17   test.equal(comb2.toString(), '12345678');
 18 
 19   var value3 = new Buffer(3);
 20   value3[0] = '6'.charCodeAt(0);
 21   value3[1] = '7'.charCodeAt(0);
 22   value3[2] = '8'.charCodeAt(0);
 23 
 24   var comb3 = Helpers._combineData(buffer, value3);
 25 
 26   test.equal(comb3.toString(), '12345678');
 27 
 28   var sql = 'insert into a values(?, ?, ?)';
 29   var newsql = Helpers._sqlFormat(sql, ['1', 2, null], ['\'', '', '']);
 30 
 31   test.equal(newsql, "insert into a values('1', 2, NULL)");
 32 
 33   var unescaped = 'insert into "a values(\b)';
 34   var escaped = Helpers._escapeString(unescaped);
 35 
 36   test.equal(escaped, "insert into \"\"a values(\\b)");
 37 
 38 //Test Input validation functions
 39   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputBoolean(null) === false);
 40   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputBoolean(4) === false);
 41   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputBoolean(3.14) === false);
 42   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputBoolean('qwerty') === false);
 43   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputBoolean(true) === true);
 44   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputBoolean(1) === true);
 45 
 46   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputPositive(null) === false);
 47   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputPositive(3.14) === true);
 48   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputPositive(-1) === false);
 49   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputPositive(0) === true);
 50   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputPositive(14) === true);
 51 
 52   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputTimeout(null) === false);
 53   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputTimeout(3.14) === false);
 54   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputTimeout(-1) === false);
 55   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputTimeout(0) === true);
 56   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputTimeout(14) === true);
 57 
 58   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputString(null) === false);
 59   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputString(3) === false);
 60   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputString(true) === false);
 61   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputString('') === false);
 62   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputString('querty') === true);
 63 
 64   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputSQLString(null) === false);
 65   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputSQLString(3) === false);
 66   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputSQLString(true) === false);
 67   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputSQLString('') === false);
 68   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputSQLString('a') === false);
 69   test.ok(Helpers._validateInputSQLString('qwerty') === true);
 70 
 71   console.log('Unit test ended OK.');
 72   test.done();
 73 };
 74
